title: Jay Wright, Hall of Fame Villanova Basketball Coach, Retires
description: A head coach since 1994, Wright, 60, had a .695 career winning percentage across tenures at Hofstra and Villanova. His 21-season career at Villanova included national titles in 2016 and 2018.
dc:creator: Adam Zagoria
media:credit: Bob Donnan/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Jay Wright, third from left, took Villanova to the Final Four in 2022.
